text: Ani januna ghya ki, yud'dhata hastagata kelela konatyahi prakaraca mala (dhana-sampada) tumhi prapta karala tara tyaca pacava his'sa tara allaha ani rasula ani nateva'ika ani anatha ani goragariba, ani pravasankarita ahe. Jara tumhi allahavara imana rakhale ahe ani tyavara je amhi apalya dasavara tya divasi avatarita kele, jo satya ani asatyacya daramyana alagavaca hota, jya divasi donhi sain'ye apasata bhidali hoti ani allaha pratyeka gostice samarthya balaganara ahe
